name: Mega Asteroid
description:
Your goal : kill'em all!

They're strong or weak, but be careful, if you kill someone you take his weapon. 

Use different weapons which shoot in different directions : 

- Forward

- Sideways

- Backwards ?

Try to get the best score !

This project was made in C++ with the SFML library only (no game engine was used)

Controls : 

Z : Move forward

Mouse : Aim

Space : Shoot

Team : 

Remi VEDRENNE

Thomas TAKAGI

Luca SCHIFANO
